comment.author: 79783743@N07
comment._content: I think this is Manly Cove, not Manly Beach. This appears to be the harbour side of Manly - not the surf side.Think the title should be amended!

comment.author: 27331537@N06
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/79783743@N07] Yes indeed it should be Manly Cove! Thanks.
-AG

comment.author: 29391093@N06
comment._content: Can still remember swimming here as a kid, was one of the best pools around, pity Manly Council didnt replace it after Cyclone Tracy, was great to walk along the walkway and watch swimmers, and the speed boat rides
